text: hurrimat ʿalaykumu l-maytatu wal-damu walahmu l-khinziri wama uhilla lighayri l-lahi bihi wal-mun'khaniqatu wal-mawqudhatu wal-mutaradiyatu wal-natihatu wama akala l-sabuʿu illa ma dhakkaytum wama dhubiha ʿala l-nusubi wa-an tastaqsimu bil-azlami dhalikum fis'qun l-yawma ya-isa alladhina kafaru min dinikum fala takhshawhum wa-ikh'shawni l-yawma akmaltu lakum dinakum wa-atmamtu ʿalaykum niʿ'mati waraditu lakumu l-is'lama dinan famani ud'turra fi makhmasatin ghayra mutajanifin li-ith'min fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
